title: A Flat Tire at the Fietsenmaker

content.text: Your bicycle has a flat tire. You've taken it to a bike mechanic ('fietsenmaker'). Your goal is to get it fixed quickly.

content.title: Stating the Problem
content.setting: You've just walked into a small bike repair shop. The mechanic looks up from a wheel he's working on.

conversation_flow.title: State that your back tire is flat.
Ask if they can repair it.
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Ah, een lekke achterband. Dat is vervelend.

content.title: Talking About Time
content.setting: The mechanic is inspecting your tire.

conversation_flow.title: Ask how long the repair will take.
Say you need the bike today before 5 o'clock.

content.title: An Unexpected Complication
content.setting: The mechanic nods, agreeing to the time. He then quickly checks the rest of your bike.

conversation_flow.title: Ask what it costs.
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Oké, geen probleem. Voor vijf uur is prima.

conversation_flow.title: React with surprise.
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Dat is twintig euro. Ik zie ook dat uw lichten kapot zijn.

data.meaning: What does only the tire cost?

content.title: Negotiating the Repair
content.setting: The mechanic points to your broken front light. You are in a hurry and only want the essential repair.

conversation_flow.title: Say you only want the tire fixed for now.
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Ja, de lichten moet ik ook repareren. Dat is dan dertig euro in totaal.

conversation_flow.title: Ask for the price for only the tire.
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Oké, alleen de band. Geen probleem.

data.meaning: I will come at four o'clock.

content.title: Confirming the Agreement
content.setting: The mechanic confirms the price for the single repair. Time to agree and set a pickup time.

conversation_flow.title: Agree to the price.
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Alleen de band is vijftien euro.

conversation_flow.title: Confirm you will pick it up at 4 o'clock.
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Perfect. Dan is uw fiets klaar om vier uur.
